author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Titan Pharmaceuticals: Names Federico Seghi Recli To Board
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Titan Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* ACCOMPLISHED GLOBAL PHARMACEUTICAL EXECUTIVE, FEDERICO SEGHI RECLI, APPOINTED TO TITAN’S BOARD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
